005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegexUtil;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegularExpressionMetapathException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.LinkedList;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.regex.Matcher;
024import java.util.regex.Pattern;
025import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
029
030/**
031 * Implements <a href=
032 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize">fn:tokenize</a>.
033 */
034public final class FnTokenize {
035  private static final String NAME = "tokenize";
036  @NonNull
037  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
038      .name(NAME)
039      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
040      .deterministic()
041      .contextIndependent()
042      .focusIndependent()
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("input")
045          .type(IStringItem.class)
046          .zeroOrOne()
047          .build())
048      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
049      .returnZeroOrMore()
050      .functionHandler(FnTokenize::executeOneArg)
051      .build();
052  @NonNull
053  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
054      .name(NAME)
055      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
056      .deterministic()
057      .contextIndependent()
058      .focusIndependent()
059      .argument(IArgument.builder()
060          .name("input")
061          .type(IStringItem.class)
062          .zeroOrOne()
063          .build())
064      .argument(IArgument.builder()
065          .name("pattern")
066          .type(IStringItem.class)
067          .one()
068          .build())
069      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
070      .returnZeroOrMore()
071      .functionHandler(FnTokenize::executeTwoArg)
072      .build();
073
074  @NonNull
075  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
076      .name(NAME)
077      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
078      .deterministic()
079      .contextIndependent()
080      .focusIndependent()
081      .argument(IArgument.builder()
082          .name("input")
083          .type(IStringItem.class)
084          .zeroOrOne()
085          .build())
086      .argument(IArgument.builder()
087          .name("pattern")
088          .type(IStringItem.class)
089          .one()
090          .build())
091      .argument(IArgument.builder()
092          .name("flags")
093          .type(IStringItem.class)
094          .one()
095          .build())
096      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
097      .returnZeroOrMore()
098      .functionHandler(FnTokenize::executeThreeArg)
099      .build();
100
101  @NonNull
102  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeOneArg(
103      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
104      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
105      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
106      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
107    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
108
109    return input == null
110        ? ISequence.empty()
111        : ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(
112            fnTokenize(input.normalizeSpace().asString(), " ", "").stream()
113                .map(IStringItem::valueOf)));
114  }
115
116  @NonNull
117  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeTwoArg(
118      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
119      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
120      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
121      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
122    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
123    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
124
125    return execute(input, pattern, IStringItem.valueOf(""));
126  }
127
128  @NonNull
129  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeThreeArg(
130      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
131      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
132      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
133      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
134
135    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
136    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
137    IStringItem flags = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
138
139    return execute(input, pattern, flags);
140  }
141
142  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
143  @NonNull
144  private static ISequence<IStringItem> execute(
145      @Nullable IStringItem input,
146      @NonNull IStringItem pattern,
147      @NonNull IStringItem flags) {
148    return input == null
149        ? ISequence.empty()
150        : fnTokenize(input, pattern, flags);
151  }
152
153  /**
154   * Implements <a href=
155   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize">fn:tokenize</a>.
156   *
157   * @param input
158   *          the string to tokenize
159   * @param pattern
160   *          the regular expression to use for identifying token boundaries
161   * @param flags
162   *          matching options
163   * @return the sequence of tokens
164   */
165  @NonNull
166  public static ISequence<IStringItem> fnTokenize(
167      @NonNull IStringItem input,
168      @NonNull IStringItem pattern,
169      @NonNull IStringItem flags) {
170    return ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(
171        fnTokenize(input.asString(), pattern.asString(), flags.asString()).stream()
172            .map(IStringItem::valueOf)));
173  }
174
175  /**
176   * Implements <a href=
177   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize">fn:tokenize</a>.
178   *
179   * @param input
180   *          the string to match against
181   * @param pattern
182   *          the regular expression to use for matching
183   * @param flags
184   *          matching options
185   * @return the stream of tokens
186   */
187  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
188  @NonNull
189  public static List<String> fnTokenize(@NonNull String input, @NonNull String pattern, @NonNull String flags) {
190    if (input.isEmpty()) {
191      return CollectionUtil.emptyList();
192    }
193
194    try {
195      Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile(pattern, RegexUtil.parseFlags(flags)).matcher(input);
196
197      int lastPosition = 0;
198      int length = input.length();
199
200      List<String> result = new LinkedList<>();
201      while (matcher.find()) {
202        String group = matcher.group();
203        if (group.isEmpty()) {
204          throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(RegularExpressionMetapathException.MATCHES_ZERO_LENGTH_STRING,
205              String.format("Pattern '%s' will match a zero-length string.", pattern));
206        }
207
208        int start = matcher.start();
209        if (start == 0) {
210          result.add("");
211        } else {
212          result.add(input.substring(lastPosition, start));
213        }
214
215        lastPosition = matcher.end();
216      }
217
218      if (lastPosition == length) {
219        result.add("");
220      } else {
221        result.add(input.substring(lastPosition, length));
222      }
223
224      return result;
225    } catch (PatternSyntaxException ex) {
226      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_EXPRESSION, ex);
227    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
228      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_FLAG, ex);
229    }
230  }
231
232  private FnTokenize() {
233    // disable construction
234  }
235}
